attributes.action: choose between Congestion Charging or Road Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Paying both Road Tax and a Congestion Charge is unfair. We pay road tax to use the roads, but to use certain areas, such as Central London then we have to pay another Tax. 
I would like to prime minister to look into this unfair policy and make a choice of the preferred policy and scrap the other.
